languages.text: "{mf|Господин|Госпожа} из рода фон Валанциус! Приятно видеть хоть одного достойного человека на этом сборище..." {n}Мужчина прищуривается.{/n} "Можем ли мы поговорить? Содействие представителя уважаемой династии очень бы помогло... предотвратить чудовищную несправедливость".

"Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."
languages.original_text: "{mf|Господин|Госпожа} из рода фон Валанциус! Приятно видеть хоть одного достойного человека на этом сборище..." {n}Мужчина прищуривается.{/n} "Можем ли мы поговорить? Содействие представителя уважаемой династии очень бы помогло... предотвратить чудовищную несправедливость".

traits.locale_text: "Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

"Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

"Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

"Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

"Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

languages.text: “冯·瓦兰修斯王朝尊贵的领主！我很高兴，这群人之中终于来了个正派人……”{n}他眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我们可以谈谈吗？如果能得到受人尊敬的王朝特使的支持，这会有助于……制止极其不公平的可怕结果。”
languages.original_text: "Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

traits.locale_text: “冯·瓦兰修斯王朝尊贵的领主！我很高兴，这群人之中终于来了个正派人……”{n}他眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我们可以谈谈吗？如果能得到受人尊敬的王朝特使的支持，这会有助于……制止极其不公平的可怕结果。”

languages.text: «¡Buen señor{mf||a} de la casa von Valancius! Me alegra enormemente ver que hay al menos una persona íntegra entre toda esta gente...». {n}Entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Podemos hablar? El apoyo de{mf|l| la} enviad{mf|o|a} de una dinastía prestigiosa podría ser de gran ayuda... para evitar que se produzca una terrible injusticia».
languages.original_text: "Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

traits.locale_text: «¡Buen señor{mf||a} de la casa von Valancius! Me alegra enormemente ver que hay al menos una persona íntegra entre toda esta gente...». {n}Entrecierra los ojos.{/n} «¿Podemos hablar? El apoyo de{mf|l| la} enviad{mf|o|a} de una dinastía prestigiosa podría ser de gran ayuda... para evitar que se produzca una terrible injusticia».

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス家の{mf|旦那|ご婦人}じゃないか！やっとまともな人に会えたぜ…」{n}彼が目を細めた。{/n}「少し話せるか？力のある王朝の使者が手を貸してくれたらありがたい…酷い不正義が起こるのを防ぎたい」
languages.original_text: "Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス家の{mf|旦那|ご婦人}じゃないか！やっとまともな人に会えたぜ…」{n}彼が目を細めた。{/n}「少し話せるか？力のある王朝の使者が手を貸してくれたらありがたい…酷い不正義が起こるのを防ぎたい」

languages.text: "{mf|Werter Lord|Werte Lady} des Hauses von Valancius! Ich bin ja so froh, wenigstens eine anständige Person in dieser Menge zu entdecken ..." {n}Er kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Können wir reden? Die Unterstützung durch {mf|einen Gesandten|eine Gesandtin} einer angesehenen Dynastie könnte eine große Hilfe sein ... um zu verhindern, dass ein großes Unrecht geschieht."
languages.original_text: "Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Werter Lord|Werte Lady} des Hauses von Valancius! Ich bin ja so froh, wenigstens eine anständige Person in dieser Menge zu entdecken ..." {n}Er kneift die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Können wir reden? Die Unterstützung durch {mf|einen Gesandten|eine Gesandtin} einer angesehenen Dynastie könnte eine große Hilfe sein ... um zu verhindern, dass ein großes Unrecht geschieht."

languages.text: « {mf|Mon cher seigneur|Ma chère dame} von Valancius ! Quel bonheur de trouver au moins une personne respectable dans cette foule... Puis-je vous parler ? {n}demande-t-il en plissant les yeux.{/n} Le soutien de l'émissaire d'une éminente dynastie pourrait m'être d'un grand secours... pour empêcher une terrible injustice. »
languages.original_text: "Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Mon cher seigneur|Ma chère dame} von Valancius ! Quel bonheur de trouver au moins une personne respectable dans cette foule... Puis-je vous parler ? {n}demande-t-il en plissant les yeux.{/n} Le soutien de l'émissaire d'une éminente dynastie pourrait m'être d'un grand secours... pour empêcher une terrible injustice. »

languages.text: "Von Valancius Hanesi'nin kıymetli {mf|beyefendisi|hanımefendisi}! Bu kalabalıkta bir tane olsun düzgün insan görebilmek ne güzel." {n}Gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Konuşabilir miyiz? Saygın bir hanedanlığın elçisinin desteği... Korkunç bir adaletsizliğin önüne geçebilir."
languages.original_text: "Good {mf|sir|lady} of House von Valancius! I'm ever so glad to see at least one decent person in this crowd..." {n}His eyes narrow.{/n} "Can we talk? Support from an envoy of an esteemed dynasty could very much help... to prevent a terrible injustice from happening."

traits.locale_text: "Von Valancius Hanesi'nin kıymetli {mf|beyefendisi|hanımefendisi}! Bu kalabalıkta bir tane saygın insan görebildiğim için çok memnun oldum..." {n}Gözlerini kısıyor.{/n} "Konuşabilir miyiz? Saygın bir hanedanlığın elçisinden destek görmek, korkunç bir adaletsizliğin önüne geçebilir."
